p: In this work, the molecular dynamics simulation software was used to study the influence mechanism of montmorillonite charge density on hydration performance by studying the Z-density distribution of water molecules, H w, and Ca 2+ in the interlayer, the mean square displacement curve (MSD) and diffusion coefficient of water molecules, and the radial distribution function (RDF) of Ca-H w, Ca-O w, Ca-O t, O t-H w, and O t-Q w.
